Name: Nora: The Wannabe Alchemist
About the game: NOTE: NORA: THE WANNABE ALCHEMIST IS STILL IN EARLY ACCESS AND NOT A COMPLETE GAME. It was released as a full game, which cannot be changed on Steam. New chapters will be released in the future! Current game state: At present the game offers the first playable chapter. We are looking to release the second one before the end of July. The entire game should be complete before the end of 2022. Witchcraft school dropout Nora has two great ambitions. One: Dust her cottage without breaking any potion bottles. Two: Become a great alchemist! This vibrantly illustrated point-and-click game pits klutziness against good intentions – a ticking clock against wilting houseplants. Move into Nora’s cozy-but-cluttered witch’s cottage, brew more than 50 powerful potions and achieve domestic bliss in this truly magical visual novel / time management hybrid. Key Features: Brew potions and fulfill orders. Grow and harvest alchemical plants … or sell them for money! Decorate your rooms. Hone and upgrade your abilities. Collect more than 20 unique ingredients.
